mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_nickname, b.aci_name, count(c.bcmi_bdi_seq) as comment_cnt FROM board_info a left outer join account_info b on a.bdi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq left outer join board_comment_info c on a.bdi_seq = c.bcmi_bdi_seq where bdi_status <= 2 and bdi_title like '%${keyword}%' group by a.bdi_seq order by bdi_reg_dt desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
SELECT ceil(count(*)/10) from board_info where bdi_status = 1 and bdi_title like '%${keyword}%' limit 10 offset #{offset}
SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_name FROM board_info a left outer join account_info b on a.bdi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq where bdi_status = 1 and bdi_seq = #{seq}

SELECT a.*, b.aci_seq, b.aci_id, b.aci_nickname FROM board_comment_info a left outer join account_info b on a.bcmi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq where bcmi_status <= 2 and bcmi_bdi_seq = #{seq} limit 10 offset #{offset}
SELECT ceil(count(*)/10) from board_comment_info limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment_info (bcmi_aci_seq, bcmi_bdi_seq, bcmi_comment, bcmi_status) VALUES (#{bcmi_aci_seq}, #{bcmi_bdi_seq}, #{bcmi_comment}, 1);
mapper.select: select ( UNIX_TIMESTAMP() > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(bci_count_dt)+10 ) from board_count_info where bci_aci_seq = #{user} and bci_bdi_seq = #{board} order by bci_count_dt desc limit 1
select count(*) from board_count_info where bci_bdi_seq = #{board}
